page.title: 19HOMES FOR THE ELDERLY
page.content: In Callington there are two main {residential homes. }CHYVARHAS, a Cornwall C.C. establishment, accommodates 5O people including married couples. It is a complex of single storey buildings set in gardens, with 24 single bedrooms, l3 double, 4 lounges with colour TV and indoor recreational facilities. Food is prepared in a large kitchen & served in a central dining hall. 24-hour care is provided by 22 staff, mainly female, under 4 managers. Relatives & friends visit during the day and groups from the community bring entertainment on special occasions. ST THERESE is a privately run home managed on similar lines. A charitable trust own 4{bungalows}which are let to the elderly at a nominal rent. Caradon D.C. provides{sheltered {housing}on its housing estate.
